title: Chicken and Strawbery Salad
story:
Quick and simple salad, best when strawberies are in season.

For the salad leaves I usualy take butter letuce and mix it with some baby spinach and arugula. Sometimes (when I have it in my fridge) I like to add some philadelfia or similar cheese to this salad. But even without cheese, it's great.
instructions: Mix flour with corn startch, season with some salt and pepper
Slice chicken, coat in flour mixture
Trim off fennel's stalks, cut bulb in half and slice one half crosswise as thin as you can.
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, pepper and your favorite herbs. Put aside for a couple of minutes.
Mix all ingredients, season with sauce.
